title: Plan for coal
creator_credit: Data Film Productions and Stuart Legg
brief_description: Shows the British coal industry; its history and significance from the first World War, through the depression of the 1930s to the present day. Some indication is given of long-term planning being carried out by the National Coal Board for the stabilisation and modernisation of the industry. Shows some of the new equipment being used. Narrated by Howard Crawford, Michael Goodliffe.
